snippet: An Indian court sentenced Lalu Prasad, a former chief minister of the state of Bihar, to five years in prison for corruption on Thursday.
abstract: Indian court sentences Lalu Prasad, former chief minister in state of Bihar, to five years in prison for corruption after he is found guilty of participating in decade-long scheme that stole public funds earmarked for animal husbandry.
lead_paragraph: An Indian court sentenced Lalu Prasad, a former chief minister of the state of Bihar, to five years in prison for corruption on Thursday.

headline.main: India: Ex-Official Is Jailed in Graft Case
headline.print_headline: India: Ex-Official Jailed in Graft Case
